title: Andreas M. Antonopoulos
body:
IP Objective: 
Minimum Fund Raising Target: 500 000
Maximum Fund Raising Target: 1 000 000
Stake Pool Start Date: 2021.12.01 17:30 
Stake Pool End Time: 2021.12.05  18:30

Andreas Antonopoulos is a Greek-British tech entrepreneur who’s also known for being a Bitcoin and blockchain advocate. He’s also an author who has written books that help explain Bitcoin and the blockchain industry, such as Mastering Bitcoin: Unlocking Digital Currencies, Mastering Ethereum, and The Internet of Money. 

He’s active on different social and digital platforms. Aside from having a Twitter account with more than 600,000 followers, he also runs a popular YouTube channel, aantonop, where he posts videos about Bitcoin, blockchain, and cryptocurrency, among others. These videos give an in-depth look at the industry, making them a great jump-off point for beginners who want to have a better understanding of blockchain and crypto and how they work. On the channel, he also shares interviews, Q-and-As, and live streams. On his website, he offers workshops and other resources that’ll help bolster your crypto education. On top of all these platforms, Antonopoulos also runs two podcasts, the Unscripted Podcast and the Speaking of Bitcoin Podcast.
author: 0x6c665834015f725Bd27FECDA2394806BE3b8D6d9
